meanings.definition: Not held in place by an anchor.
meanings.sent1: The boat drifted away because it was unanchored.
meanings.sent2: The unanchored balloon floated freely in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The unanchored kite soared high above the trees.
meanings.sent5: The unanchored ship bobbed on the open sea.

meanings.definition: Not secured or fixed in place.
meanings.sent1: The unanchored tent flew away in the strong wind.
meanings.sent2: The unanchored bookshelf toppled over easily.
meanings.sent3: The unanchored swing moved back and forth with the breeze.
meanings.sent4: His unanchored ideas kept changing rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The unanchored flag fluttered in the air.
